parameters.name: mask

param_schema.title: Mask
param_schema.description: Input mask for inpaint mode. Black areas will be preserved, white areas will be inpainted.

parameters.description: Input mask for inpaint mode. Black areas will be preserved, white areas will be inpainted.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: with smoke, half ice and half fire and ultra realistic in detail.wolf, typography, dark fantasy, wildlife photography, vibrant, cinematic and on a black background

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: with smoke, half ice and half fire and ultra realistic in detail.wolf, typography, dark fantasy, wildlife photography, vibrant, cinematic and on a black background

parameters.name: lora_scale

param_schema.title: Lora Scale
param_schema.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.name: batched_prompt

param_schema.title: Batched Prompt
param_schema.description: When active, your prompt will be split by newlines and images will be generated for each individual line

parameters.description: When active, your prompt will be split by newlines and images will be generated for each individual line

parameters.name: apply_watermark

param_schema.title: Apply Watermark
param_schema.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.name: prompt_strength

param_schema.title: Prompt Strength
param_schema.description: Prompt strength when using img2img / inpaint. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.description: Prompt strength when using img2img / inpaint. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.name: replicate_weights

param_schema.title: Replicate Weights
param_schema.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.name: disable_safety_checker

param_schema.title: Disable Safety Checker
param_schema.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety

parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Input mask for inpaint mode. Black areas will be preserved, white areas will be inpainted.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.default: with smoke, half ice and half fire and ultra realistic in detail.wolf, typography, dark fantasy, wildlife photography, vibrant, cinematic and on a black background

lora_scale.title: Lora Scale
lora_scale.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

batched_prompt.title: Batched Prompt
batched_prompt.description: When active, your prompt will be split by newlines and images will be generated for each individual line

apply_watermark.title: Apply Watermark
apply_watermark.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

prompt_strength.title: Prompt Strength
prompt_strength.description: Prompt strength when using img2img / inpaint. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

replicate_weights.title: Replicate Weights
replicate_weights.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
